Measured Value. Final effluent (does not include recirculated water).
It is considered that the water emissions given by the plant are additional to those of the sulfidic tailing dataset. The first go to surface water after going through the WWT, while the second come from leaching and go to underground water.

0.2% Cu in ore; Calculated Value based on ore composition.

1.8 ppm Au in ore; Calculated Value. When the amount is calculated based on the ore composition (1,79 g Au/t ore), the amount of recovered gold is higher than the amount of extracted gold. We hence calculate the amount of extracted gold based on a hypothetic recovery rate of 85%.
